channel.title: Need help with Client.java

item.title: Need help with Client.java
item.dc:creator: @lolaccount lolaccount
item.description:
@lolaccount wrote:

Uhmm im new… and i know get that, i re-did client.java and have no errors… but my account is glitched and whenever i try to tele somewere i lost conection… and now every time i log on i get banned -.- someone help please…

Read full topic

Probably at the bottom. Please post the code you put in.
